name: Alfric the Goofy Wizard
description:
ALFRIC • THE GOOFY WIZARD — OLSCHOOL FPS — PITCH

You're Alfric, a low-tier wizard, chilling and watching Nesflictus in the dungeon your parents bought you. All your powers come from a very ancient and powerfull spellbook you inherited from your father. You use this spellbook every morning to summon your breakfast cereals.

But today... you've spelled wrong.

HOW TO WIN?
  • Close all the demonic portals and kill all the creatures to win the game
  • KEEP MOVING
CONTROLS

Keyboard only!

  • ↑↓ Move forward/backward ←→ Look around

Shooting spells

  1. Holding [Space] — Open Spell Book
  2. ←→ Turn pages to choose a spell
  3. Release [Space] — Select the Spell
  4. Spell sequence : just press the damn keys when they reach the center of the screen :)
RECOMMENDED SPECS Web version
  • Google Chrome browser

Graphics are downgraded. Please use the Windows version for a full experience.

Windows version
  • Quad-core CPU (or better)
  • nVidia GTX 1050 (2GB VRAM or better)
  • 4GB RAM (or better)
MacOS version
  • Quad-core CPU (or better)
  • Dedicated AMD/Nvidia GPU (Intel iGPU will not play smoothly)
  • 4GB RAM (or better)
